title: Romina Khurshid meets DPM Dar; discusses upcoming COP29 summit
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 05 (APP): Coordinator to the Prime Minister on Climate Change and Environmental Coordination Romina Khurshid Alam on Friday called on Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar here.
In the meeting, she briefed him about the efforts made to mitigate the threat of climate change in Pakistan, and sought support from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs for the upcoming COP29 to be held in Baku this year.
The deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister expressed full support to Ministry of Climate Change during the COP29 process.
